name: Rally Racer Open World 1
description:
Hello Guys!

This is my second game. Unfortunately this game is very buggy. Sorry for all the errors in the game.  I will try to make better games in the future. In this game.

This is a simple open world game. In this game the main character is a police car. all you have to do is to drive around. Please download the game and consider following

CONTROLS

W - Forward

A - Left

D - Right

S - Reverse
